snippet: Kevin Stadler and his father, Craig, who have drifted over the years, will be reunited at Augusta National this week, the first father and son to play the tournament in the same year.
abstract: Craig Stadler and his son, Kevin, find golf to be the multivitamin that renews their father-and-son relationship; they are both playing in the 78th Masters, Kevin for the first time and his father says it will likely be his last; pair is first father and son to play the Masters in the same year.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Stadler and his father, Craig, who have drifted over the years, will be reunited at Augusta National this week, the first father and son to play the tournament in the same year.

headline.main: Family Connection Breaks Ground at Masters
headline.print_headline: Family Connection Breaks Ground at Masters
